title: Minimal Dashboard
description: A minimalist browser dashboard with search functionality and customizable links.
content:
The Minimal Dashboard is a custom browser homepage designed with speed and minimalism in mind. It features a clean black and white aesthetic, ultra-fast loading times, and focuses on providing essential functionality without visual distractions.

Features

  • Search functionality with multiple engine options
  • Customizable link groups
  • Real-time clock
  • Minimal UI with grid background
  • Zero dependencies

Technical Details

The dashboard is built using vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with no frameworks or build tools. This ensures minimal loading times and excellent performance across all devices.

The core features include:

  • Custom search implementation that supports multiple search engines
  • Time display with real-time updates
  • CSS grid for responsive layout
  • Configurable link groups via JSON

Implementation

The layout uses CSS Grid for the main structure, with flexbox for individual components. The visual design incorporates a subtle grid background with a noise texture overlay to add depth without compromising the minimalist aesthetic.
